name: Tropical Turmoil
description:
After a few iOS hits, Underground Pixel is back in action! From the guys who brought you Pastry Panic and Mansion Run comes an all new arcade experience, Tropical Turmoil!

Play as a toucan who must rely on the help of his friends to save his home! When loggers come looking to destroy the forest, our protagonist steps up with a plan! Help this hero save the day by collecting the coins his friends will deliver periodically... just don't let the enemies below snatch the loot!

Fail to reach a checkpoint in time and it's game over! Pay off the loggers in time or you'll be run out of town! Take advantage of power-ups to become #1 on the leaderboards, and stay tuned for free updates!
